attributes.action: Call a referendum on EU membership.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has become more apparent that the general feeling up and down the country is the EU no longer provides sufficient benefits to the UK for what it costs the population.
There is great feeling among the general public that we as a nation can adopt the legislative laws and ideas within our own government and also refine them to suit the country.
The costs to the British taxpayer far outweighs the benefits of being an EU member state and as such we would like to have a vote on it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
